overview:
Chris Maher is the CEO of House Party. He joined the company in September of 2011, eager to lead House Party into the next phase of its continuing growth and success.

A widely respected executive, Chris brings 15 years experience in management, operations and sales. Most recently, Chris served as CEO of eBureau, a venture-backed company specializing in predictive analytics and online ad targeting. Prior to that, he was President of Hitwise, an internet measurement firm, where he oversaw the company’s global operations and financial performance. Chris was a key member of the company’s executive team that led a $260M sale to Experian in June of 2007. Before that, Chris was Vice President of Sales at Jupiter Media Metrix, a leading internet and technology research firm that went public in October of 1999.

Chris received a BA from Dartmouth College and an MA from Boston College. He resides in Connecticut with his wife, Stephanie, and their two daughters.
